angry       = >( >:( >[ >:[ :angry:
aw          = :aw:
cool        = 8) 8] :cool:
ecstatic    = :D 8D :ecstatic:
furious     = >:D >< :furious:
gah         = D: :O :gah:
happy       = :) :] :happy:
heart       = <3 :heart:
hm          = :/ :hm:
kiss        = :3 :kiss:
meh         = :| -.- <_< >_> :meh:
mmf         = :x :mmf:
sad         = :( :[ ;( ;[ :sad:
tongue      = :P :tongue:
what        = :o :? :what:
wink        = ;) ;] :wink:
